caption:
This photo captures a stark and somewhat ominous industrial scene dominated by several large smokestacks emitting thick black smoke against a cloudy sky. The scene is devoid of people or natural landscapes, focusing instead on the environmental impact of industrial activities.

Foreground:
- In the lower part of the image, multiple tall, narrow smokestacks are visible. These are aligned horizontally and fill the width of the frame.
- From each smokestack, copious amounts of dark, dense smoke are billowing out. The smoke is rising and then being carried off by the wind, suggesting some air movement in the scene.

Background:
- The sky forms the backdrop, adding a dramatic element to the overall composition. It is filled with extensive clouds which are colored with shades of purples and blues, hinting at either early dawn or late dusk lighting.
- The clouds are dense and voluminous, which blends with the emitted smoke, highlighting the scale of air pollution.

Overall Composition:
- The contrast between the dark smoke and the subtly colored sky creates a visually striking image. The scene is framed to emphasize the industrial structures and their environmental impact, devoid of any human presence or natural elements, which could suggest a commentary on industrialization and environmental degradation.
title: Chimney of u.s.  Steel plant emit smoke 24 hours a day
